posts.post_title: Red Sox tobacco cards for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Greg Theberge
My bill paying wife sends her thanks to all. All the cards have been sold.

T206 Carrigan SGC 70: $100 Sold
T206 Jake Stahl SGC 50: $50 Sold
T205 Clyde Engle SGC 50: $50 Sold
T204 Ramly Carrigan SGC 40 (very nice card, small crease): $125 SOLD Thank you
T205 Ed Cicotte SGC 60: $225 SOLD Thank you
T206 Lord SGC 10: $18 Sold
T207 Gardiner SCG 60: $70 Sold

Shipping fees additional - exact postage only.

Email me at GSTheberge@yahoo.com if any interest. Thank you
